pyqgis_plugin.name: WaterGrid
pyqgis_plugin.description: WaterGrid DB System. 주요 기능: PostGIS 데이터베이스 연결 및 관리.
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin provides a comprehensive system to manage and update WaterGrid data directly in QGIS using PostGIS integration. Designed for water infrastructure management and data handling.
pyqgis_plugin.author: Jin,Hong @ICTWAY COMPANY
pyqgis_plugin.changelog: Version 1.0.5 (2024-12-27) - add boxtool [Version 1.0.4.1 (2024-12-26) - File Update Code Modify [Version 1.0.4 (2024-12-26) - Bugs Fix (no pip_hol,pip_hol)
